content: That helps! So, it's a bit of a slow burn, but the payoff is worth it. I'm interested in trying it out. By the way, I've been listening to audiobooks during my daily commute, and I've been able to finish a book every few weeks. Like "The Nightingale", which took me about three weeks to finish. Do you think I could finish "All the Light We Cannot See" in a similar timeframe if I listen to it during my daily commute?
